name: Anomaly: Girls Beyond Science
summary:
As a fan of the supernatural, you couldn’t help but investigate a rumor about a local abandoned amusement park… Little did you know that your curiosity would lead to an unstoppable creature being unleashed upon the world! Just when you think it’s about to all be over, you’re saved by a mysterious organization that aims to protect people from such monsters!

Now that you know their secret, they have no choice but to recruit you into their ranks! Will you be able to protect your town from a mysterious anomaly?
